attributes.additional_details: People want to work, people dont want to strike and he is holding the whole process up
attributes.background: Remove the mp as transport minister.  His refusal to even talk with TOC’s and even acknowledge them is proof that this man does not care about the ongoing strikes

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be remove from office.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
